mapper.sql: tra_id, car_number, start_time, end_time, distance_carry, distance_empty, distance_cal
mapper.insert:
insert into gps_trajectory_stat (tra_id, car_number, start_time, end_time, distance_carry, distance_empty, distance_cal) values
( #{trajectory.traId}, #{trajectory.carNumber}, #{trajectory.startTime}, #{trajectory.endTime}, #{trajectory.distanceCarry}, #{trajectory.distanceEmpty}, #{trajectory.distanceCal} )
mapper.select: select car_number as carNumber, lng, lat, `time`, tra_id as traId from gps_points where tra_id = #{traId} order by `time`
select start_lng as lng, start_lat as lat, count(*) as `count` from gps_trajectory_stat where start_time >= #{minTime} and start_time <= #{maxTime} group by start_lng, start_lat
select end_lng as lng, end_lat as lat, count(*) as `count` from gps_trajectory_stat where end_time >= #{minTime} and end_time <= #{maxTime} group by end_lng, end_lat
